snippet: After an embarrassing early loss at Wimbledon, Pete Sampras won what proved to be his last tournament 10 years ago, beating Andre Agassi in the United States Open.
abstract: American tennis champion Pete Sampras reflects on the 10th anniversary of his victory over Andre Agassi in the men's final of the 2002 United States Open, what proved to be the last tournament of Sampras's career.
lead_paragraph: After an embarrassing early loss at Wimbledon, Pete Sampras won what proved to be his last tournament 10 years ago, beating Andre Agassi in the United States Open.

headline.seo: For Sampras 10 Years Ago, a Grand Finale at U.S. Open
